column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It doesn't help that the waiter just comes back to our table to ask my girlfriend and I if we were doing okay every 10minutes while he sure as hell know that we're just waiting and wondering when the hell we will get to eat. Mind you
column2: my girlfriend's vegan so she can't even have the mozzarella sticks (and don't dare say the dough isn't vegan
column3: we had believed it was...let us live that lie).
